data.text:
airtel is hiring for SDE 1 Expected Salary: 15-18 LPA Experience: 0-2 years Poshmark is hiring for Software Engineering Intern Expected Stipend: 3 - 4 LPA Verifone is hiring for Software Development Engineer Expected Salary: 9-14 LPA Experience: 0-2 years Upper Crust Foods Private Limited Pvt Ltd is hiring for Data Analyst Expected Salary: ₹ 3 - 5 LPA Jar is hiring for Data Analyst Intern Expected Salary: 2-4 LPA Check out first #comment for application link Follow Gopinath S #Happy2help and turn on #Notification icon on my profile. Also, check out other posts for other opportunities! Like, Share and Tag your friends in the comment box

Tata Consultancy Services Walk-in drive for Cloud technology professionals Yes, Redefine your career with us! Join the walk-in drive at TCS Hyderabad #MakeTheBigMove Storage Admin : https://lnkd.in/dZ22q_qf Backup Admin : https://lnkd.in/dDVn6vBN Windows VMWare SME : https://lnkd.in/deBqZQt8 Solaris SME: https://lnkd.in/duumJfr9 SQL DBA: https://lnkd.in/deC9Wwwj Oracle DBA: https://lnkd.in/djZyNrUC ITSM SEM Project Management: https://lnkd.in/dkzJN2pZ ITSM Change Management: https://lnkd.in/deFAm4ep ITSM Incident Management: https://lnkd.in/dAJZhtgz Azure DevOps: https://lnkd.in/dxH_ZXAQ Google Cloud Infra Engineer: https://lnkd.in/dHzSFNek Java Microservice Full stack: https://lnkd.in/dYaVm4KA AWS DevOps: https://lnkd.in/d73rXGpk GCP Data Architect: https://lnkd.in/did6y_eQ GCP Cloud Architect: https://lnkd.in/dK9RwXCw Azure Kubernetes Service: https://lnkd.in/dEVkG_kD Azure Networking Service: https://lnkd.in/dy-xnxXV Azure Core VM Engineer: https://lnkd.in/dZJdjW3Y Azure Networking Engineer: https://lnkd.in/d6iYkpCw Click on the above links to apply for the jobs or enter the job IDs in the banner in https://lnkd.in/dTTKv9B2 and register Walk In Drive Date : 16TH March 2024 Registration Time : 09:30 AM – 12:30PM Venue : Tata Consultancy Services ,Deccan Park Plot No 1, Software Units Layout, Madhapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081 Joining Location- Hyderabad Only. Eligibility Criteria: • Minimum 15 years of regular education (10th + 12th + 3 years graduation) • BE/BTech/MCA/M.Sc/MS with minimum 2 years of relevant experience post Qualification IT- Experience. • BSc/BCA Graduates with minimum 2.5 years of relevant experience post qualification IT Experience. • Only Full Time courses would be considered. Things to carry for interview: 1. One copy of an updated resume, Government ID proof, 1 Passport size photo, Double Covid-19 vaccination certificate (Hard/soft copy) TCS Application form 2. All documents from previous employers (relieving letter, experience letter) 3. Wearing a mask to the venue is mandatory #hyderabad #storageadmin #oracle #hiringalert #hiringnow #azure #devops #googlecloud #javafullstackdeveloper #aws #awsarchitect #gcpcloud #gcpdataengineer
